name: Hostile Juxtaposition, Greater
text: This spell functions like hostile juxtaposition, except you can target one creature for every four caster levels you have or you can target a single creature that is larger than you are. You can switch places with each target only once while the effect lasts. Once you have used it to teleport and switch places with each affected target, the spell is discharged.
duration_zh: 1轮/等级 或 直至能量发散
text_zh:
这个法术工作方式如同恶意换位 (Hostile Juxtaposition)，不过你可以每4施法者等级设定一个目标，或者你可以将一个体积比你大的生物设为目标。

你可以在效果持续中随意和任何一个受术目标进行位置交换。

一旦你使用了本法术的传送效果与任何一个受术生物交换位置，法术效果结束。
